channel.title: [svn]Revival - Client Release
channel.description:
This is my friend Sadistic from r-s's client that he's worked very hard on. He's asked me to post it here. Proof: [img]http://i.imgur.com/8V4Wy.png[/img] C/Ped from r-s
Well I've done all I could for this client. I'm not adding higher revision data because I hope people will customize it for theirselves. I will be adding the new model header and removing CRC for those of you wanting to customize it. Here is the project thread for those of you wanting pictures: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/projects/311946-revival.html svn link: https://revival-client.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/revival-client For those of you without svn I'm only uploading the initial version: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IK0BC9FY Instructions are included in the download, but if you need a clean 377 cache you can use this: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GTI1QIYC Base is MITB but I've added content from Galkon's so you guys will be more familiar with it. Have fun! This client is my pride and joy. I just hope people actually use it >.> Edit: Quick features list. 474, 484, 508, 562 gameframes fully working. Orbs, hp, prayer, run, all work. Console, press ` to open it when logged in. Item dumper, use the command iteminfo in the console. Ripped Galkon's interface packer from RuneLimited :p haven't tested it. Context menus over gameframe. Flashing chat buttons.
Here's a video of the features: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3NwSR-v_iIw

item.title: [svn]Revival - Client Release
item.dc:creator: @Stale_Milk Stale Milk
item.description:
@Stale_Milk wrote:

This is my friend Sadistic from r-s’s client that he’s worked very hard on. He’s asked me to post it here.
Proof:
C/Ped from r-s

Well I've done all I could for this client. I'm not adding higher revision data because I hope people will customize it for theirselves. I will be adding the new model header and removing CRC for those of you wanting to customize it.

Here is the project thread for those of you wanting pictures: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/projects/311946-revival.html

svn link: https://revival-client.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/revival-client

For those of you without svn I’m only uploading the initial version: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=IK0BC9FY

Instructions are included in the download, but if you need a clean 377 cache you can use this: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GTI1QIYC

Base is MITB but I’ve added content from Galkon’s so you guys will be more familiar with it.
Have fun! This client is my pride and joy. I just hope people actually use it >.>

Edit: Quick features list.

474, 484, 508, 562 gameframes fully working.
Orbs, hp, prayer, run, all work.
Console, press ` to open it when logged in.
Item dumper, use the command iteminfo in the console.
Ripped Galkon’s interface packer from RuneLimited haven’t tested it.
Context menus over gameframe.
Flashing chat buttons.

Here’s a video of the features: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3NwSR-v_iIw

Read full topic
